title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 50.7 - Report of each disinfection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 50.7 - Report of each disinfection

State Regulations

The owner or operator of the auction, or those charged with
the care and control of the premises disinfected, shall promptly make and file
a report of each disinfection with the Department of Agriculture and Markets
upon forms furnished by the commissioner, and each report shall be signed by an
approved disinfector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
50.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
